text.div: This value set provides an example of possible codes representing PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 3. PhPID Lvl3 identifies medicinal products based on their generic composition of active substance(s) with administrable dose form. It is envisioned that IDMP PhPIDs will be used in the next future.

description.value: This value set provides an example of possible codes representing PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 3. PhPID Lvl3 identifies medicinal products based on their generic composition of active substance(s) with administrable dose form. It is envisioned that IDMP PhPIDs will be used in the next future.

display.value: Acetaminophen only product in rectal dose form
Amoxicillin and clavulanic acid only product in oral dose form
Lithium citrate only product in oral dose form
Acenocoumarol only product in oral dose form
